Caption: Fig. 1. Examples of methods for multivariate data visualization, showing the cars dataset [16], with ac = acceleration, mg = miles per gallon, w = weight, hp = horse power, yr = model year, or = origin, cy = cylinders, and dp = displacement. Colors denote the origin: yellow for USA; blue for Europe; and red for Japan.
